il_representations.test_support package¶

Submodules¶

il_representations.test_support.configuration module¶

Benchmark ingredient configurations for unit testing.

il_representations.test_support.utils module¶

il_representations.test_support.utils.files_are_identical(p1, p2, read_size=65535)¶

Figure out whether paths p1 and p2 point to an identical file. Takes the dumb approach of reading the entire file out, but this make it robust to choice of whether file is copied vs. symlinked vs. hardlinked.

Note that this only works for ordinary files, and not sockets etc.; for ‘interactive’ files, BufferedReader.read() might return a short read before EOF, in which case this function will break.
